definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: the blossom covered the chestnut trees like great wax candles.
sentences.chinese: 满被花朵的栗子树像是巨大的蜡烛。

sentences.english: We ate half a jin of roast chestnuts, had a nap and soon arrived in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 一路上吃了半斤炒栗子，睡了一会儿觉，就到了北京。

sentences.english: The Lizigou gold deposit in Song Country, western Henan Province, China, belongs to the altered tectonic type ore golden deposit.
sentences.chinese: 豫西嵩县栗子沟金矿属于构造蚀变岩型金矿床。

sentences.english: In Changshu, Jiangsu province, the chestnut trees and osmanthus trees are planted together, so the chestnut has the flavor of osmanthus.
sentences.chinese: 江苏常熟栗树与桂树相伴生长，所产栗子有桂花香味。

sentences.english: In our province, the most common Chifa is Tangchaolizai.
sentences.chinese: 在我省，最常见的吃法是糖炒栗子。

sentences.english: Chestnut coat color is my favorite, like the light to light some assumptions.
sentences.chinese: 栗子皮颜色是我的最爱，假设喜欢亮可以浅些。

sentences.english: And being weary she sat her down under a chestnut-tree to rest.
sentences.chinese: 她太累了，于是在一棵栗子树下坐下来休息。

sentences.english: Mix the rum with chestnut cream and fold it into the cream.
sentences.chinese: 混合黑朗姆和栗子奶油，切拌进淡奶油。

sentences.english: Sauteed Foie Gras and Chestnut, Tea Foam, Brandy Megranate Ball.
sentences.chinese: 香煎鹅肝配以栗子，菊花泡沫，白兰地石榴沙司珠。
香香的糖烤栗子就好了。

sentences.english: Turkey Breast Roulade, Chestnut Stuffing, Cranberry Jelly.
sentences.chinese: 火鸡胸脯颤音，栗子馅，蔓越莓果冻。

sentences.english: They paddled over the lake and landed under a crooked chestnut tree on Owl Island.
sentences.chinese: 他们划过湖，在猫头鹰岛上一棵弯曲的栗子树下登陆。

sentences.english: Overhead the chestnut branches were covered with blossom.
sentences.chinese: 栗子树在我们头顶撑开缀满繁花的树冠。

sentences.english: The husk of thoroughly cooked chestnuts turns reddish brown.
sentences.chinese: 完全炒熟的栗子会呈现出深棕色。

sentences.english: Chestnut cream soup, port wine, truffle.
sentences.chinese: 奶油栗子汤，波特酒，黑菌。

sentences.english: "Chestnuts, hot roast chestnuts, " a peddler cried.
sentences.chinese: “栗子，热乎乎的烤栗子，”一个小贩在叫卖。
